Serik.D1: Hey Serik! We're stuck now! [!CDATA[<font color = "#ff0000">The debris is blocking the entrance!</font>]]
Serik.D2: Hmmm... we need to get rid of it somehow...
Serik.D3: There's a lava pig over there! Maybe we can make use of it somehow...
Serik.D4: Actually, back in the vilage, I realised I could temporarily possess creatures. Maybe I could do the same to the pig!
Serik.D5: Yes! That's worth a try! Look! there's some goo here! We can blow the debris away with an explosion!

Ryuunosuke.D1: 異議あり！異議あり！異議あり！異議あり！異議あり！異議あり！異議あり！異議あり！異議あり！異議あり！Objection!Objection!Objection!Objection!Objection!
